commands.name: help
commands.use:
dh help [command]
	     Was it really useful ?

commands.name: send
commands.description: Sends a message to a Discord channel through a WebHook API call.

commands.name: register
commands.description: Register a new webhook to your user profile.

commands.name: unregister
commands.description: Remove a registered WebHook from your user profile.

commands.name: list
commands.description: List all links registered on your user profile.
